text: I have a client making reference to enabling 'add modules' for some of the template files we developed for them. After selecting the template from landing pages they would like to be able to add in simple modules like a line of text where one does not exist in the template. Is this possible? If so, how can I enable this functionality?

Jordan, I believe this is what you're looking for
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-pages-editor/how-to-use-flexible-columns-in-your-pages>
Good morning HubSpotters, Im new to the channel! Excited to contribute and be part of the team!
